tuv.seg: Coming to work in Ireland
Ag teacht go hÉirinn chun oibriú
The rights of EU nationals and non-EU nationals to work in Ireland and includes information on how to apply for an employment permit
Ceart na náisiúnach AE agus na náisiúnach neamh-AE chun oibriú in Éirinn. Áirítear faisnéis ar conas iarratas a dhéanamh ar chead fostaíochta
Find out about General Employment Permits, who may apply and when a person with an employment permit may change jobs
Faigh amach faoi Cheadanna Fostaíochta Ginearálta, cé atá i dteideal iarratas a dhéanamh agus cá huair is féidir le duine a bhfuil cead oibre aige poist a mhalartú
This document is in: Employment > Migrant workers > Employment permits
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Oibrithe imirceacha > Ceadanna fostaíochta
Coming from the EU/EEA to work
Ag teacht ón AE/LEE chun oibriú
Details the rights of EU/EEA nationals to come to Ireland to work, and covers rights while working
Cur síos ar cheart na náisiúnach AE agus na náisiúnach neamh-AE chun oibriú in Éirinn agus áirítear a gcearta fhostaíochta
In addition deals with the entitlements of Irish citizens returning to Ireland particularly if unemployed
Ina theannta sin leagtar amach agus áirítear teidlíochtaí saoránach Éireannaigh a thagann ar ais in Éirinn, go háirithe na daoine dífhostaithe
This document is in: Employment > Migrant workers
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Oibrithe imirceacha
Details of the arrangements to give access to employment for spouses, partners and dependants of non-EEA nationals who are holders of Critical Skills Employment Permits and researchers

Mionsonraí na socruithe le teacht ar fhostaíocht a dhéanamh do chéilí, do pháirtnéirí agus do chleithiúnaigh shaoránaigh neamh-LEE atá ina sealbhóirí Ceada Fostaíochta Scileanna Ríthábhachtacha nó taighdeoirí
This document is in: Employment > Migrant workers > Employment permits
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Oibrithe imirceacha > Ceadanna fostaíochta
Critical Skills Employment Permit
Cead Fostaíochta Scileanna Ríthábhachtacha
The Critical Skills Employment Permit is an employment permit for employees in designated categories, depending on salary level
Is cead fostaíochta é Cead Fostaíochta Scileanna Ríthábhachtacha d'fhostaithe i gcatagóirí ainmnithe, ag brath ar leibhéal an tuarastail
This document is in: Employment > Migrant workers > Employment permits
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Oibrithe imirceacha > Ceadanna fostaíochta
Further and higher education qualifications
Cáilíochtaí ardoideachais agus oideachais leanúnaigh
The system of validation of qualifications in further and higher education
An córas aitheantais atá ann do cháilíochtaí
This document is in: Education and Training > Third-level education > Colleges and qualifications
This document is in: Oideachas agus Oiliúint > Oideachas tríú leibhéil > Coláistí agus Cáilíochtaí
Finding a job in Ireland
Post a fháil in Éirinn
Information for EEA nationals and non-EEA nationals about how to look for employment in Ireland
Cuireann an doiciméad seo faisnéis ar fáil do náisiúnaigh LEE agus náisiúnaigh neamh-LEE faoi conas fostaíócht a fháil in Éirinn
This document is in: Employment > Migrant workers
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Oibrithe imirceacha
Coming to Ireland - tax and social insurance
Ag teacht go hÉirinn - cáin agus ÁSPC
Important information for those coming to work in Ireland about tax issues of residence, domicile, double taxation, income earned prior to moving, and temporary employment in Ireland
Ag teacht go hÉirinn le dul ag obair anseo; cáin, áit chónaithe, áit sainchónithe, cánachas dúbailte, ioncam a saoraíodh roimh theacht go hÉirinn agus fostaíocht sealadach in Éirinn
This document is in: Employment > Migrant workers
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Oibrithe imirceacha
Coming to set up a business or invest in Ireland
Teacht go hÉirinn le infheistiú nó gnó a chur ar bun
Information for foreign nationals on the immigrant investor, entrepreneur and business permission schemes
Faisnéis do náisiúnaigh choigríche, a áiríonn faisnéis faoi na scéimeanna inimircigh d’infheisteora, fiontraí agus chead gnó
This document is in: Employment > Types of employment > Self-employment
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Cineálacha Fostaíochta > Féinfhostaíocht
